Summary: Falling bright blue flashing teardrop-shaped object.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around June 24th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt roughly 10 pm i was lying in bed in my bedroom which has full length glass windows which looks west. suddenly i saw a fast moving blue flash that was like a large flare that fell out of the sky and disappeared behind an apt bldg several blocks away. i thought a helicopter dropped out of the sky and i rushed to turn the tv on to see breaking news. it was very bright blue and left a white tail like light behind it as it fell. it was probably 1 or 2 seconds when it disappeared behind the bldg. it was almost like a falling star or a firework that fizzled and fell back to the ground. there was no sign of anything in the sky directly after the initial event. i called my husband to look but nothing else happened. it was not a lighting bolt, it had an arch curve to the fall and was more like a falling star.
